treatment-md.title: Congocepheus rwandensis Fernandez, Theron & Leiva, 2016, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Revision of the family Carabodidae (Acari, Oribatida) V. Fourth part. Two new species of the genus Congocepheus from the Republic of Rwanda: Congocepheusrwandensis sp. n., and Congocepheuskayoveae sp. n.
